Constructor(I)

1 #include<iostream>
2 using namespace std;
3 struct complexCls{
4   double re,img;
5   void setRe(double r){re=r;}
6   void setImg(double i){img=i;}
7   double getRe(void){return re;}
8   double getImg(void){return img;}
9 };
10 void f1(void){
11   //complexCls c1=2; // Error
12   //complexCls c1(2,3); // Error
13   complexCls c1{2,3};
14   cout<<c1.getRe()<<"  "<<c1.getImg()<<endl;
15   c1.re=12;
16   c1.setRe(12);
17   c1.setImg(4);
18   cout<<c1.getRe()<<endl;
19 }
20 int main(){f1();return 0;}
1 #include<iostream>
2 using namespace std;
3 struct complexCls{
4   double re,img;
5   complexCls(double r=0,double i=0)
6   {img=i;re=r;cout<<re<<endl;}
7   //complexCls(double r=0,double i)
8   //{img=i;re=r;}//Error
9   double getRe(void){return re;}
10   double getImg(void){return img;}
11 };
12 void f1(void){
13   complexCls c1(12,14);
14   complexCls c2 = 12;
15   c2 = 992;
16   complexCls c3(12);
17   complexCls c4(12, 0);
18   complexCls c5;
19   complexCls c6 = 0;
20   complexCls c7(0);
21   complexCls c8(0, 0);
22   cout << c1.getRe() << endl;
23 }
24 int main(){f1();return 0;}

Constructor(II)

1 #include <iostream>
2 using namespace std;
3 struct myArray{
4   double a[100];
5   int n;
6   myArray(double ma[], int k){
7     n = k;
8     for(int i = 0; i < n; i++)
9       a[i] = ma[i];
10   }
11   void print(void){
12     cout << " n = " << n << endl;
13     for(int i = 0; i < n; i++)
14       cout << "a[" << i << "] = " << a[i] << endl;
15   }
16 };
17 int main(){
18   double x[]{10, 12, 34, 54};
19   myArray d(x, sizeof(x) / sizeof(double));
20   d.print();
21 }

Another way of writing for

1 #include <iostream>
2 using namespace std;
3 struct myArray{
4   double a[100];
5   int n;
6   myArray(double ma[], int k){
7     for(n = k--; k >= 0; k--)
8       a[k] = ma[k];
9   }
10   void print(void){
11     cout << " n = " << n << endl;
12     for(int i = 0; i < n; i++)
13       cout << "a[" << i << "] = " << a[i] << endl;
14   }
15 };
16 int main(){
17   double x[]{10, 12, 34, 54};
18   myArray d(x, sizeof(x) / sizeof(double));
19   myArray b(x, sizeof(x) / sizeof(double));
20   d.print();
21   b.print();
22 }

Const (IV)

1 #include <iostream>
2 using namespace std;
3 const int MAX_NUMBER_OF_CELLS = 100;
4 struct myArray{
5   double a[MAX_NUMBER_OF_CELLS];
6   int n;
7   myArray(const double ma[], int k){
8     if( k > MAX_NUMBER_OF_CELLS ) 
9       k = MAX_NUMBER_OF_CELLS ;
10     else if( k < 0)
11       k = 0;
12     for(n = k--; k >= 0; k--)
13       a[k] = ma[k];
14   }
15   void print(void){
16     cout << " n = " << n << endl;
17     for(int i = 0; i < n; i++)
18       cout << "a[" << i << "] = " << a[i] << endl;
19   }
20 };
21 int main(){
22   double x[]{10, 12, 34, 54};
23   myArray d(x, sizeof(x) / sizeof(double));
24   d.print();
25 }

static in struct(I)

1 #include <iostream>
2 using namespace std;
3 struct myArray{
4   static const int MAX = 100;
5   double a[MAX];
6   int n;
7   myArray(const double ma[], int k){
8     if( k< 0 || k > MAX) 
9       k = MAX ;
10     for(n = k--; k >= 0; k--)
11       a[k] = ma[k];
12   }
13   void print(void){
14     cout << " n = " << n << "\t MAX: " << MAX << endl;
15     for(int i = 0; i < n; i++)
16       cout << "a[" << i << "] = " << a[i] << endl;
17   }
18 };
19 int main(){
20   double x[]{10, 12, 34, 54};
21   myArray d(x, sizeof(x) / sizeof(double));
22   myArray b(x, sizeof(x) / sizeof(double));
23   d.print();  b.a[1] = 94;  d.print();  b.print();
24 }

static in struct(II)

1 #include <iostream>
2 using namespace std;
3 struct myArray{
4   static const int MAX = 100;
5   static int other_static;
6   double a[MAX];
7   int n;
8   myArray(const double ma[], int k){
9     if( k > MAX) 
10       k = MAX ;
11     for(n = k--; k >= 0; k--)
12       a[k] = ma[k];
13   }
14   void print(void){
15     cout << " n = " << n 
16       << "\t other_static: " 
17       << other_static << endl;
18     for(int i = 0; i < n; i++)
19       cout << "a[" << i << "] = " 
20       << a[i] << endl;
21   }
22 };
23 int myArray::other_static = 20 ;
24 // int myArray.other_static = 20 ; // Error
25 int main(){
26   double x[]{10, 12, 34, 54};
27   myArray d(x, sizeof(x) / sizeof(double));
28   myArray b(x, sizeof(x) / sizeof(double));
29   d.print();  b.a[1] = 94;  
30   b.other_static = 94; d.print();  b.print();
31 }

Static Function in struct(I)

1 #include <iostream> 
2 using namespace std; // 100486.22
3 struct myArray{
4   static const int MAX = 100;
5   static int other_static;
6   double a[MAX];
7   int n;
8   myArray(const double ma[], int k){
9     if( k > MAX) 
10       k = MAX ;
11     for(n = k--; k >= 0; k--)
12       a[k] = ma[k];
13   }
14   void print(void){
15     cout << " n = " << n << "\t other_static: " 
16       << other_static << endl;
17     for(int i = 0; i < n; i++)
18       cout << "a[" << i << "] = " << a[i] << endl;
19   }
20   static void printStatic(void){
21     cout << "MAX: " << MAX << endl;
22     cout << "other_static: " << other_static << endl;
23   }
24 };
25 int myArray::other_static = 20 ;
26 int main(){
27   double x[]{10, 12, 34, 54};
28   myArray d(x, sizeof(x) / sizeof(double));
29   myArray b(x, sizeof(x) / sizeof(double));
30   b.printStatic();
31   d.print();  b.a[1] = 94; b.other_static = 94; 
32   d.print();  b.print(); myArray::printStatic();
33 }

this

1 struct myArray{//100488.01.this
2   static const int MAX = 100;
3   static int other_static;
4   double a[MAX];
5   int n; // myArray* this = & ....
6   myArray(const double ma[], int k){
7     if( k > MAX) k = MAX ;
8     for(n = k--; k >= 0; k--)
9       a[k] = ma[k];
10   }
11   void print(){
12     cout << "n= " << n << "\t other " 
13       << other_static << endl;
14     for(int i = 0; i < n; i++)
15       cout << a[i] << endl;
16   }
17   static void printStatic(){
18     cout << "MAX: " << MAX << 
19     "\tother: "<<other_static<<endl;
20   }
21 };
22 int myArray::other_static = 20 ;
23 int main(){double x[]{10, 12, 34, 54};
24   myArray d(x, sizeof(x)/sizeof(double));
25   // d.this = &d;
26   myArray b(x, sizeof(x)/sizeof(double));
27   b.printStatic(); d.print();b.a[1] = 94; 
28   b.other_static = 94;  d.print();  
29   b.print(); myArray::printStatic();
30 }
1 struct myArray{// 100488.02.this
2   static const int MAX = 100;
3   static int other_static;
4   double a[MAX];
5   int n; // myArray* this = & ...
6   myArray(const double a[], int n){
7     if( n > MAX) n = MAX ;
8     for(this->n = n--; n >= 0; n--)
9       this-> a[n] = a[n];
10   }
11   void print(void){int i=0;
12     cout<<" n= "<<this->n<<"\tother:" 
13       << other_static << endl;
14     for(; i < (*this).n; i++)
15       cout<< this->a[i] << endl;
16   }
17   static void printStatic(void){
18     cout<<"MAX: "<<MAX<<"\tother: " 
19       << other_static << endl;
20   }
21 };
22 int myArray::other_static = 20 ;
23 int main(){double x[]{10, 12, 34, 54};
24   myArray d(x, 4); myArray b(x, 4);
25   b.printStatic(); d.print();b.a[1]=94;
26   b.other_static = 94;d.print();
27   b.print(); myArray::printStatic();
28 }

lvalue & rvalue

 1 int ar[10] = {2, 3, 4};
 2 int a = 2, b = 3 , c = 5;
 3 a = a + 2;
 4 /* t = a + 2
 5   a = t
 6 */
 7 a = a + b + c + 2;
 8 /*
 9   t1 = a + b
10   t2 = t1  + c
11   t3 = t2 + 2
12   a = t3
13 */
14 a += a + 2;
15 // a = a + a + 2
16 // a + 2 += a // Error
17 // (a + 2) = (a + 2) + a // Error
18 // (a+2) = 2 Error
19 // a+2 = 2 Error
20 int* p = &a;
21 *p = 4; // a = 4;
22 p = ar;  // p = &ar[0]
23 *(p + 2) = 34; // p[2] = 34; ar[2] = 34;
24 p[3] = 76;

18     for(n = k--; k >= 0; k--)
19       a[k] = ma[k];
20   }
21   void print(void){
22     cout << " n = " << n << endl;
23     for(int i = 0; i < n; i++)
24       cout << "a[" << i << "] = " << a[i] << endl;
25   }
26 };

2 int main(){

18     pma[i] = new int*[20];
19     for(auto j = 0; j < 20; j++){
20       *(*(pma+i)+j) = new int[30];
21       for(auto k = 0; k < 30; k++)
22         *(*(*(pma+i)+j)+k ) = k+i+j;
23     }
24   }

26     for(auto j = 0; j < 20; j++){
27       for(auto k = 0; k < 30; k++)
28         cout << *(*(*(pma+i)+j)+k ) << endl;
29     }
30   }
31   for(auto i = 0; i < 10; i++){
32     for(auto j = 0; j < 20; j++){
33       delete[] *(*(pma+i)+j);
34       *(*(pma+i)+j) = nullptr;
35     }

38   }

Copy constructor

3 struct myComplex{//mycomplex/100580
4   double re=0, img=0;
5   myComplex(const double a = 0,
6             const double b = 0)
7   {re = a; img = b;}
8   myComplex(const myComplex&c){
9     re=c.re; img=c.img;
10     cout<<"copy constructor"<<endl;
11   }
12   void print(){cout<<'('<<re<<","
13          << img << ')' << endl;
14   }
15   void input(){
16     cout<<"Enter real: ";cin>>re;
17     cout<<"Imaginary: ";cin>>img;
18   }
19   myComplex add(const myComplex& a){
20     myComplex r = a;  r.re  += re;
21     r.img += img;  return r;
22   }
23   myComplex sub(const myComplex& a){
24     myComplex r; r.re = re - a.re;
24   }
25   myComplex mul(const myComplex& a){
26     myComplex r;
27     r.re = re * a.re - img * a.img;
28     r.img = img * a.re + re * a.img;
29     return r;
30   }
31 };

9       for(int i=0;i<n;i++)a[i]=ma[i];
10     }
11   }
12   ~myArray(){delete[] a;
13     a=nullptr; n=0;
14     cout << "Destructor" << endl;
15   }
16   double get(const int index = 0){
17     if(index < n) return a[index];
18     cout<<"Error:get"<<endl;
19     return 0;
20   }
21   void set(const int index,
22            const double value){
23     if(index < n)a[index]=value;
24     else cout<<"Error:set"<<endl;
25   }
26   myArray(const myArray& b){
27     cout<<"copy constructor"<<endl;
28     n = b.n; a = new double[n];
29     for(int i=0;i<n;i++)a[i]=b.a[i];
30   }
31   void print(){
1     cout << " n = " << n << endl;
2     for(int i = 0; i < n; i++)
3       cout << a[i] << endl;
4   }
5 };
6 void f2(myArray&);

9   cout<<"before f2"<<endl;  f2(p);
10 }

18     cin >> img;
19   }

21     myComplex r = a;
22     r.re  += re;// r.re = r.re + re
23     r.img += img;
24     return r;

27     myComplex r;
28     r.re = re - a.re;
1     r.img = img - a.img;
2     return r;

7     r.img = img * a.re + re * a.img;
8     return r;
9   }

Explicit Constructor(I)

1 struct myComplex{ // 100575
2   double re, img; // explicit
3   explicit myComplex(const double a = 0, 
4             const double b = 0){ 
5     re = a; 
6     img = b;
7   }
8   void print(void){ 
9     cout << '(' << re << ", " 
10       << img << ')' << endl; 
11   }
12   void input(void){
13     cout << "Enter real ";
14     cin >> re;
15     cout << "Enter imaginary ";
16     cin >> img;
17   }
18   myComplex add(const myComplex& a){
19     myComplex r = a;
20     r.re  += re;
21     r.img += img;
22     return r;
23   }
24   myComplex sub(const myComplex& a){
25     myComplex r;
26     r.re = re - a.re;
27     r.img = img - a.img;
28     return r;
29   }
1   myComplex mul(const myComplex& a){
2     myComplex r;
3     r.re = re * a.re - img * a.img;
4     r.img = img * a.re + re * a.img;
5     return r;
6   }
7 };
8 int main(){
9   myComplex a(2, 3), b(4), c;
10   c = a.add(b); 
11   // c = a.add(2);
12   c.print();
13   a.input();
14   c = a.sub(b);// c = a - b
15   c.print();
16   b.input();
17   c = a.mul(b);// c = a * b
18   c.print();

Friend Function(I)

2 using namespace std;
3 class myArray{ // 102300
4   static const int MAX = 100;
5   double a[MAX]; int n;  public:
6   double get(const int index=0){
7     if(index < n) return a[index];
8     cout<<"Error:get"<<endl;
9     return 0;
10   }
11   void set(const int index,
12            const double value){
13     if(index < n) a[index]=value;
14     else cout<<"Error:set"<<endl;
15   }
16   myArray(const double* ma=nullptr,
17           int k = 0){
18     if(k > MAX)k = MAX ;
19     for(n = k--; k >= 0; k--)
20       a[k] = ma[k];
21   }
22   myArray(const myArray& b){
23     cout<<"copy constructor"<<endl;
24     n = b.n;
25     for(int i=0;i<n;i++)a[i]=b.a[i];
26   }
27   ~myArray()
28   {cout<<"Destructor"<<endl;}
29   void print(void){
30     cout << " n = " << n << endl;
31     for(int i = 0; i < n; i++)
32       cout<< a[i] << endl;
33   }
34   friend void f2(myArray k);
35 };
36 void f2(myArray); // declaration
37 int main(){double x[]{10,12,34,54};
38   myArray d(x, 4); myArray p(d);
39   cout<<"before f2"<<endl; f2(p);
40 }
41 void f2(myArray k){ k.print();}

Friend Function(II)

2 using namespace std;
3 class myArray{ // 102310
4   static const int MAX = 100;
5   double a[MAX]; int n; public:
6   double get(const int index = 0){
7     if(index < n) return a[index];
8     cout<<"Error:get "<<endl;
9     return 0;
10   }
11   void set(const int index,
12            const double value){
13     if(index < n) a[index] = value;
14     else cout<<"Error:set"<<endl;
15   }
16   myArray(const double* ma=nullptr,
17           int k = 0){
18     if( k > MAX ) k = MAX ;
19     for(n = k--; k >= 0; k--)
20       a[k] = ma[k];
21   }
22   myArray(const myArray& b){
23     cout<<"copy constructor"<<endl;
24     n = b.n;
25     for(int i=0;i<n;i++)a[i]=b.a[i];
26   }
27   ~myArray()
28   {cout << "Destructor" << endl;}
29   void print(){
30     cout << " n = " << n << endl;
31     for(int i = 0; i < n; i++)
32       cout << a[i] << endl;
33   }
34   friend void f2(myArray k)
35   {k.print();}
36 };
37 int main(){double x[]{10, 12, 34, 54};
38   myArray d(x, 4); myArray p(d);
39   cout<<"before f2"<<endl; f2(p);
40 }

Friend Class

2 int myStrcmp(char* st1, char* st2){
3   for(; *st1 && *st2; st1++, st2++)
4     if(*st1 < *st2) return -1;
5     else if(*st1 > *st2) return 1;
6   if(*st1 == '\0')
7     if(*st2 == '\0') return 0;
8     else return -1;
9   return 1;
10 }
11 class universityClass;
12 class student{
13   char name[20]="";
14   long long  id;
15   char address[50]="";
16   public:
17   void input(void){
18     cout<<"Enter name:"; cin>>name;
19     cout<<"id:"; cin>>id;
20     cout<<"address:"; cin>>address;
21   }
22   void print(void){
23     cout << "name:\t" << name << endl;
24     cout << "id:\t" << id << endl;
25     cout << "address:\t" << address << endl;
26   }
27   friend class universityClass;
28 };
29 class universityClass{
30   student st[50];
31   double marks[50]={0};
32   int n=0;
33   char instructor[20]="";
34   public:
35   void input(void){
36     cout << "Enter number of students:";
37     cin >> n;
38     for(int i=0; i<n; i++)
39       st[i].input();
40     cout << "Enter name of instructor:";
41     cin >> instructor;
42   }
43   void print(void){
44     cout << "number of students:" << n;
45     cout << endl << "instructor: " 
46       << instructor << endl;
47     for(int i=0; i < n; i++){
48       st[i].print();
49       cout << "mark: " << marks[i] << endl;
50     }
51   }
52   void changeMark(char stName[20], 
53     double mark){
54     int i;
55     for(i=0; i < n; i++)
56      if(myStrcmp(stName, st[i].name) == 0)
57        marks[i] = mark;
58   }
59 };
60 int main(){ universityClass stList; 
61   stList.input();
62   stList.print();
63 }

Dynamic Memory in Class(I)

2 class student{
3   char* name = nullptr;
4   long long id;
5   char* address = nullptr;
6   public:
7   void input(void){
8     char nm[1000], ad[1000];
9     int i;
10     cout << "Enter name: ";
11     cin >> nm;
12     for(i=0; nm[i]; i++);
13     name = new char[++i];
14     for(; i >= 0; i--) 
15       name[i] = nm[i];
16     cout << "Enter address: ";
17     cin >> ad;
18     for(i=0; ad[i]; i++);
19     address = new char[++i];
20     for(; i>=0; i--)
21       address[i] = ad[i];
22     cout << "Enter id: ";
23     cin >> id;
24   }
25   void print(void){
26     cout << "name:\t" << name << endl;
27     cout << "id:\t" << id << endl;
28     cout << "address:\t" << address << endl;
29   }
30 };
31 void f1(void){
32   student s1[100];
33   s1[0].input();
34 }
35 void f2(void){
36   student s1[2000];
37   s1[0].input();
38 }
39 int main(){f1(); f2();}

Dynamic Memory in Class(II)

2 class student{
3   char* name = nullptr;
4   long long id;
5   char* address = nullptr;
6   public:
7   void input(void){
8     char nm[1000], ad[1000];
9     int i;
10     cout << "Enter name: ";
11     cin >> nm;
12     for(i=0; nm[i]; i++);
13     name = new char[++i];
14     for(; i >= 0; i--) 
15       name[i] = nm[i];
16     cout << "Enter address: ";
17     cin >> ad;
18     for(i=0; ad[i]; i++);
19     address = new char[++i];
20     for(i=0; i>=0; i++)
21       address[i] = ad[i];
22     cout << "Enter id: ";
23     cin >> id;
24   }
25   void print(void){
26     cout << "name:\t" << name << endl;
27     cout << "id:\t" << id << endl;
28     cout << "address:\t" << address << endl;
29   }
30   ~student(){
31     delete[] name;
32     delete[] address;
33     name = nullptr;
34     address = nullptr;
35   } 
36 };
37 void f1(void){
38   student s1[100];
39   s1[0].input();
40 }
41 void f2(void){
42   student s1[2000];
43   s1[0].input();
44 }
45 int main(){
46   f1();
47   f2();
48   return 0;
49 }

Four Pillars of OOP

  • Encapsulation
  • Abstraction
  • Polymorphism
  • Inheritence
  • reference
  • static
  • new /delete
  • pointers
  • struct copy
  • Array value
  • Function const arguments
